Apple has officially unveiled the iPhone 17 lineup, and if you’re planning a preorder, you’ll want a case ready to protect it from day one. dbrand, as usual, is ahead of the curve – its new collection for the iPhone 17 actually went live days before Apple’s announcement. The lineup includes the updated Ghost 2.0 case, which dbrand guarantees won’t turn yellow over time like many other clear cases do. There’s also the fan-favorite Grip case for folks looking to get a customizable model with ultra-grippy sides. To round things out, dbrand is also offering its Prism Screen Protectors that fit right in with its cases. Hit the jump for a closer look and more details.

items.title: Anker’s eufy E28 HydroJet robot cleaner with a detachable deep cleaner hits second-best $790 with exclusive $210 savings

Right behind the exclusive new low price we secured on the Anker eufy E25 HydroJet robot cleaner, Wellbots is giving 9to5Toys readers another exclusive deal on the brand’s E28 Omni Robot Vacuum and Mop Combo that comes with a detachable portable deep cleaner for $789.99 shipped, after using the code 9TO5EUFY210 at checkout. One quick thing to note – it seems Wellbots has mixed up photos for this model with another, but the only version of the E28 that exists is the one with the deep cleaner. While it launched in April with a $1,300 MSRP, that full price sits down at $1,000 these days, which has only seen a few discounts to $850, $800, and the $785 low last seen during July’s Prime Day event. The deal here is landing the costs just $5 above that one-time low, saving you $210 off the going rate for the second-best price we have tracked.
